thread.title: ONGC Videsh Buys 15% Stake in Rosneft Block
thread.title_full: ONGC Videsh Buys 15% Stake in Rosneft Block - WSJ

author: Vibhuti Agarwal
title: ONGC Videsh Buys 15% Stake in Rosneft Block
text:
NEW DELHI—India’s ONGC Videsh Ltd., the overseas investment arm of state-run Oil & Natural Gas Corp. Ltd., said Friday it will pay up to $1.3 billion to buy a stake in an oil-and-gas block of Russian state-run oil company Rosneft.
The Indian company has signed “definitive agreements” to acquire a 15% stake in the Vankor oil field, both... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
